CustomField.description: If Badge Label Type is set to 'Label Value', use this field to define the label for all records returned by this Contact Badge Definition. Use {!My_Custom_Field__c} syntax to display merged values
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Badge Label Type is set to 'Label Value', use this field to define the label for all records returned by this Contact Badge Definition. Use {!My_Custom_Field__c} syntax to display merged values
CustomField.label: Label Value
